TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection extends System.Collections.DictionaryBase

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of documents discovered during XML Web services discovery that have been downloaded to the client. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol> is of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection>.
## Examples The following code example enacts XML Web service discovery and downloads the discovered documents to the client. The names of the discovery documents within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection> are output to the console.
[!code-cpp[DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection2/CPP/discoveryclientdocumentcollection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection2/CS/discoveryclientdocumentcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection2/VB/discoveryclientdocumentcollection.vb#1)]
